doc.field: INDUSTRIES [TRN] AND UNIT CUT BY S/P

- Standard and Poor's Corp said it cut to BB-minus from BB-plus Trinity Industries Inc's 275 mln dlrs of liquid yield option notes. Also downgraded were the unit Trinity Industries Leasing Co's 60 mln dlrs of convertible debentures due 2006 to BB-plus from BBB-minus. S and P said the actions reflected Trinity's weakened earnings due to depressed demand in several key markets, the likelihood that a significant sustained improvement would not occur in the near-term, as well as heightened financial risk from a series of debt-financed acquisitions.
